
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define si(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define pri(x) printf("%d",x)
#define sll(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pll(x) printf("%lld",x)
#define sstr(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define pstr(s) printf("%s",s)
#define nl printf("\n")
#define ll long long int

int main()
{
    ll n,m;
    int p;
    sll(n); sll(m); si(p);
    int a[p],b[p];
    int x=0;
    map< pair<ll,ll>, int > mp;
    for(int i=0;i<p;++i) {
	si(a[i]); si(b[i]);
	mp[make_pair(a[i],b[i])]++;
    }
    map< pair<ll,ll>, int>::iterator it;
    for(it = mp.begin(); it!=mp.end();++it) {
	if(((it->first).first-1 + m-(it->first).second)%2==1) {
	    x = x ^ it->second;
	}
    }
    if(x) {
	cout<<"Yes\n";
    }
    else {
	cout<<"No\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
